title: GOP governor says he disagrees with Trump's suggestion that he would pardon Capitol rioters if reelected - CNN
content:
1. GOP governor says he disagrees with Trump's suggestion that he would pardon Capitol rioters if reelected  CNN
  2. GOP Governor Scorns Trump's Pledge to Pardon Jan. 6 Rioters: 'Oh My Goodness, No!'  The Daily Beast
  3. Trump calls for 'biggest protest we have ever had' if prosecutors 'do anything illegal' in targeting him  Yahoo News
  4. 'My goodness, no.': GOP governor reacts to Trump's pledge  CNN
  5. Marjorie Taylor Greene Attacks Lindsey Graham After He Rips Trump's Jan. 6 Pardon Idea  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Republican Gov. Chris Sununu of New Hampshire said Sunday he disagrees with former President Donald Trump's suggestion that he would pardon people charged in connection with the deadly Capitol insurrection if he was reelected.
